name: MasterQ (itch)
description:
Hello everyone, I spent a year alone making a puzzle game ,

The reason for the production is that I think hit man go is fun, so I want to say that I also do one ,

Every day to use the time off work to do this game , hard to design 81 levels , each level is carefully designed !

The story of the game is like everyone else, the hero always loves to save the beauty, and the beauty is always captured by the bad guys,

Thousands of years old Geng, but this is the man's dream, to chase the goddess in his heart !

Having said that, go and try it out!


If you like this game, you can go to steam to buy
MasterQ on Steam (steampowered.com)

My Discord id :  ly#3776
